com.sun.spot.security.implementation.ecc
Class ECCurve

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.spot.security.implementation.ecc.ECCurve
Direct Known Subclasses:
ECCurveFp
public abstract class ECCurve
extends java.lang.Object

This ECCurve class contains functions that operate on ECPoint's and to do point multiplication.

It has a factory to create ECCurve instances.

Field Detail

SECP160R1

public static final int SECP160R1
ECCurve Factory. Currently this is just a pseudo-factory, since it only supports one single curve. Feel free to add more, though...
